features: 【Knife Sets】Do you want to have the perfect set of knives? Diagsh kitchen knife set is a set of knives that can cut, peel, cut meat, dice, chop, vegetables, fruits and bread, 3.5-inch paring knife, 5-inch multifunctional knife, 6-inch nakiri knife, 7-inch Santoku knife, 7.5-inch Meat Knife, 8-inch bread knife, 8-inch chef's knife, contains all you need in the kitchen every knife, is a set of novice to professional chefs can easily cook advanced knife . Make your cutting more handy.

【Excellent Design】The knives are hand forged from high carbon stainless steel with a 2mm thick blade, designed with a 15% V-shaped beveled blade angle, high hardness and sharpness, making the knives faster and smoother to cut food. The knife handle is ergonomically designed to give you an excellent experience of perfectly fitting the palm of your hand and with a non-slip effect, the design of the whole set of knives will make your palm feel relaxed and easy in cutting and will not feel fatigue.

【Magnetic knife holder】 The magnetic wooden knife block securely holds the knives with strong magnets on both sides, eliminating the hassle of scattered knife storage. This not only keeps your kitchen more organized but also reduces the risk of accidental contact with the knives.

【Note】Knives require little maintenance to ensure long-term durability and sharpness, whether detergent cleaning, hand washing or dishwasher cleaning, this knife is no problem, effectively prevent rust and blunt, cleaning it directly after the adsorption on the knife holder, beautiful and safe. The knife holder requires simple installation and the package contains 3 screws and a screwdriver for your use.

【Ideal Gift】Our knife set is a great practical gift for family and friends, bringing them a better quality of life. If you encounter any problems, our customer service staff will respond to you within 24 hours to provide you with the perfect solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp, easy to clean, beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used these knives multiple times, they are sturdy, sharp, easy to clean, and they look great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my son as a Christmas present and he loves them. Very sharp and seem to be very nice quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Rust and chips
reviews.reviewText: My knives.....barely used are rusting and blades are chipped without any excessive or mistreatment. I thought for the price these would exceed quality. Very disappointed and looking for a return/refund so I can invest in a different high quality set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The knives are sharp and attractive.
reviews.reviewText: I like knives, but I'm not a fan of the magnetic holder. I'm not even using it. I just put these knives in the drawer instead. The knives are pretty good, sharp and attractive. They are not Damascus steel, they just have the same cool design. I recommend getting a real Damascus steel knife if you need a really professional knife. These are good, but I do not think these are going to be found in any professional kitchen anywhere. Most of us don't need that level though. My one Damascus knife plus these are more than enough for all of my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these knives
reviews.reviewText: Super sharp knives. The magnet board works great too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very attractive and keeps its edge.
reviews.reviewText: This has become my main set of knives in my kitchen. I've gone through many sets of knives over the years, knowing that I will eventually have to sharpen them with my wonderful motorized sharpening tool. Most edges rarely last a year, but these are really keeping their edge. It's been about a year, and these have outdone any other knives I own. Id say it has kept about 90% of it's sharpness. They look very cool in my kitchen as well. Also, hand wash them and dry them right away before putting them back, otherwise you will find tiny rust spots. It's a very fair price for the simple fact that they keep their edge, and look cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but quality is not great
reviews.reviewText: I love the magnetic holder but not too crazy on the quality of the knives.
